      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String addAudio​(Audio audio)
      This function receives a song and adds it to the playlist
      void checkContent()
      This function checks the content of the playlist and change hasSong or hasPodcast according to the content of the playlist
      java.lang.String deleteAudio​(java.lang.String audioName)
      This function deletes the first occurence of a song in the arraylist
      void fillMatrix()
      This function fills the matrix of the playlist to generate its code
      void generateCode()
      This function generates the code according to the content of the playlist
      java.lang.String generateOnlyPodcastCode()
      This function generates a code when the playlist contains only Podcast.
      java.lang.String generateOnlySongsCode()
      This function returns a String with the code formatted as an N
      java.lang.String generateSongsAndPodcastCode()
      This function generates the code if the playlist contains a song and a podcast.
      int getAudioPos​(java.lang.String audioName)
      This function search the song in the playlist and returns its position if the song is not found it will return -1

      • addAudio

        public java.lang.String addAudio​(Audio audio)
        This function receives a song and adds it to the playlist
        Parameters:
        audio - The song to be added
        Returns:
        A String validating the operation

      • getAudioPos

        public int getAudioPos​(java.lang.String audioName)
        This function search the song in the playlist and returns its position if the song is not found it will return -1
        Parameters:
        audioName - The audio's name that is going to be searched
        Returns:
        The position where the audio is found

      • deleteAudio

        public java.lang.String deleteAudio​(java.lang.String audioName)
        This function deletes the first occurence of a song in the arraylist
        Parameters:
        audioName - Audio's name
        Returns:
        A String validating the confirmation

      • fillMatrix

        public void fillMatrix()
        This function fills the matrix of the playlist to generate its code

      • checkContent

        public void checkContent()
        This function checks the content of the playlist and change hasSong or hasPodcast according to the content of the playlist

      • generateCode

        public void generateCode()
        This function generates the code according to the content of the playlist

      • generateOnlySongsCode

        public java.lang.String generateOnlySongsCode()
        This function returns a String with the code formatted as an N
        Returns:
        String code with the sequence of a N

      • generateOnlyPodcastCode

        public java.lang.String generateOnlyPodcastCode()
        This function generates a code when the playlist contains only Podcast. The code will be generated as a T
        Returns:
        A String with the code generated as a t

      • generateSongsAndPodcastCode

        public java.lang.String generateSongsAndPodcastCode()
        This function generates the code if the playlist contains a song and a podcast. It will generate if the position j + i is equals to an odd number and i + j is different from 1
        Returns:
        A String with the code generated

        public java.lang.String getName()
